Detailed Description

Inherit to process the DNS query result. 

 class Listener : public IDNSListener {
 public:
  virtual void onDNSQueryComplete(const IPHostEntry* dnsResult,
                                RESULT result) {
    // Handle DNS query result
  }
 };

virtual gaia::net::IDNSListener::~IDNSListener ( ) [virtual]

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::net::IDNSListener::onDNSQueryComplete ( const IPHostEntry *  dnsResult,
RESULT  result 
) [pure virtual]

DNS query is complete.

Result is passed in argument.

Parameters:
dnsResultAn IPHostEntry instance which contains IP address list, hostname of the host and alias list of given host. If there's any error occur during the query, this parameter will be NULL, and the cause will be passed through result parameter. This object will be delete by caller, function which implement onDNSQueryComplete doesn't need to delete it.
resultAn error code.
